name: MTG Finder
description: An app that allows a user to view information about specific Magic the Gathering cards. Uses the MTG dev Javascript SDK for the information and Mana MTG card symbol font.

name: GYST List
description: An app that I built for practice that allows a user to make a todo list and sort it by task type. WARNING: View in mobile mode as desktop view is incomplete.

name: Weather or Not
description: An app that helps a user find weather data along a chosen driving route. Uses google maps api and simple weather jquery plugin for data.
